title: Mobile-Based Online Collaborative Learning Design: Enhancing Social Sector Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Work Experience in Social Sector Roles
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course for working professionals to enhance collaborative competencies in social fields, operating in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones. Requires designing content that facilitates active interaction among learners and practical application to real-world tasks

learning_goals: Learners can proactively design and implement social studies collaborative tasks using a mobile platform.
Learners can propose solutions to practical work problems through group collaboration (3+ members) in limited technological environments.
Learners can contribute to content-based discussions with over 80% participation in online forums.

resources: Collaboration tools (Slack, Notion, etc., mobile apps)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
